10447.title: India's Megakitchens
10447.description: India's Megakitchens gives you a glimpse into some of India's biggest and most iconic kitchens.

15191.title: Kedarnath
15191.description: Witness the heart-wrenching survival stories of people who were caught in Kedarnathâ€™s flash floods and the rescue efforts after the massive natural disaster.

15834.title: Talwar Murder Case
15834.description: Years after the 2008 Noida double murder case of 13-year-old Aarushi Talwar and househelp Hemraj, will the puzzle ever piece together?

1000104849.title: Un Hazaaron Ke Naam
1000104849.description: An emotional tribute to the people who suffered the heinous attacks of 26/11 and to those who fought the terrorists to save the city but lost their lives.

1000228507.title: Extreme Flight: The Indian Air Force
1000228507.description: The film explores the unique operations conducted by the Indian Air Force in the extreme and hostile environment of the Himalayas.

1000232905.title: Tut's  Treasures - The Last Pharaoh
1000232905.description: The discovery of Tutankhamun's tomb in 1922 and the treasures unearthed therein gave insights on the rise and fall of the Pharoah's empire.

1260000382.title: Mega Icons
1260000382.description: Be a part of the journey into the life of iconic personalities through a scientific lens and conversations with friends and family.

1260039553.title: India From Above
1260039553.description: This two-part series showcases the beauty of India through its natural wonders, fascinating people, and diverse cultures from soaring heights.

1260039728.title: Back to the Titanic
1260039728.description: This special feature documents the first manned dives to Titanic in nearly 15 years, as experts capture unique footage of the ship to analyse its rate of decay.

1260056599.title: 1232 KMs
1260056599.description: Weeks after the nationwide COVID-19 lockdown, seven migrant labourers, on the verge of starvation, decided to go to their village just like millions of others.

1260074401.title: It Happens Only in India
1260074401.description: A series that takes you to India's colourful corners to celebrate the country's diverse culture, people, and unique traditions.

1260081197.title: Snakes SOS: Goa's Wildest
1260081197.description: Ben and Louise are no ordinary couple; wedding organizers by day, and Snake Hotline 24/7. Snakes SOS follows them on their nerve-wracking snake rescues in Goa.

1260091273.title: Shane
1260091273.description: The movie is the exploration of the rise of one of the greatest cricket players the world has known, Shane Warne.
1260091273.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Drug References

1260100712.title: Air Crash Investigation
1260100712.description: Featuring captivating reenactments and state-of-the-art CGI, Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind legendary aviation disasters.

1260109336.title: Know Your Country
1260109336.description: The series documents the history behind the symbols of independent India, how they came into being and what they mean for us now after 75 years of independence.

1260109696.title: Songs of the River
1260109696.description: Music composer Shantanu Moitra journeys across the river Ganges, capturing indelible sights and spectrums of sound to render an epic music album.

1260113036.title: India's Incredible Rescue Ops
1260113036.description: An action-packed series about daring rescue stories of India, which intersperse first-person accounts of survivors and chronicles the bravery of the rescuers.

1260127328.title: Postcards from Maharashtra
1260127328.description: A travel documentary exploring the beauty of Maharashtra. The host travels all across the state, experiencing different cuisines, history and spiritualism.

1770005014.title: Inside Tirumala Tirupati
1770005014.description: Everything in Tirumala Tirupati is larger than life. Take a look inside one of the most visited and highly revered Sri Venkateswara Swamy Temple.

1770005015.title: Inside Indian Naval Academy
1770005015.description: National Geographic takes you through a journey filled with strength and determination inside the Indian Naval Academy, Asia's largest Naval Academy.
